verbs.description: [ARG0: attorneys] [V: want] [ARG1: to drop rally defendants over nonpayment] two attorneys representing two men being sued in connection with the august 2017 deadly white nationalist rally in charlottesville virginia are again attempting to leave the case the daily progress robert ray va virginia charlottesville virginia the associated press james e kolenich james e kolenich charlottesville matthew heimbach elmer woodard
